review: unbelievable. I get out of my car with the wheels shaped in a hexigon and guess what, I die. This game truely makes me go through the emotions i need in my quiet life. 10/10 no doubt about it

This is one of the best or the best game i have ever played in my life. The graphics are amazing, the gameplay is extraordinary and the voice acting is superb. I have completed this game 4 times now and may i say, I never get sick of it! I would definetly recommend this game to anyone who is thinking of buying this, especially when on sale. Now i've finished this, time to wait for arkham city to go on sale :D.
This game is one of the best games ive ever played undoubtably. The game mods are unbeliveably good. 10/10!
